main.title: COVID-19 Data Collection Form
main.paragraph1:
This form will take about 2 minutes to complete. 
Before you begin, please select your language.

beforeStart.title: Lastly, before we begin...
beforeStart.subtitle: To reduce risk and self-harm, we advise you to:
beforeStart.advise1: Please use your own device and wear a mask when appropiate.
beforeStart.advise2: Disinfect your device and any affected or nearby surfaces after recording your cough.
beforeStart.advise3: If you have an underlying condition that increases your risk from coughing, please check with your health care provider before participating.
beforeStart.advise4: If you feel your symptoms are getting worse, please contact your local medical response.

recordCough.title: Instructions
recordCough.intro1: Please cough away from others around you! If you are feeling ill, please sit down.
recordCough.intro2: In a quiet environment, please press record and intentionally cough around 3-5 times.

recordingsIntroduction.shortRecording: Please make a recording of at least 3 seconds

recordingsRecord.text: Click the record button and cough intentionally 3 to 5 times. When you are done, click continue.
recordingsRecord.textCount: Click the record button and count clearly from one to ten. When you are done, click continue.

recordingsRecordManual.micErrorDescription: Please upload an audio file here.
recordingsRecordManual.fileDurationTooShort: Please upload a file of at least 3 seconds
recordingsRecordManual.fileSizeTooBig: Please upload a file of less than 5 MB

recordCough.intro1: Please cough away from others around you! Please sit down if you are feeling ill.
recordCough.intro2: In a quiet environment, please press record and intentionally cough around 3-5 times.

recordingsListen.title: Recording uploaded
recordingsListen.subtitle: Feel free to take a listen.
